sanskrit_verse:
वरुणेन यथा पाशैर्बद्ध एवाभिदृश्यते ।
तथा पापान्निगृह्णीयाद्व्रतमेतधि वारुणम् ॥ ९.३०८॥
transliteration:
varuṇena yathā pāśairbaddha evābhidṛśyate |
tathā pāpānnigṛhṇīyādvratametadhi vāruṇam || 9.308||
sph_interpretive_translation: As Varuna binds the violator with ropes and makes him visible, so too shall the Vratas restrain the transgressor of Dharma through conscious visibility and energetic consequence.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority flows from the consciousness of the Witness, not from coercive force.
Causation is established through energetic resonance between action and consequence.
Capacity-based responsibility arises from the ability to perceive and uphold Dharma.
Restoration logic operates through re-alignment with visible truth, not punitive concealment.
Consciousness alignment is the ultimate arbiter of justice, revealing rather than concealing.
executable_legal_axioms: IF agent violates Dharma THEN activate visibility protocol through Vrata observance.
IF transgression occurs THEN bind agent through energetic consequence, not physical restraint.
IF capacity to perceive Dharma is present THEN responsibility is absolute and immediate.
IF violation is concealed THEN automatic alignment with witnessing intelligence is triggered.
IF consciousness is realigned THEN integration into Dharma field is restored without external coercion.
supreme_court_application: In Supreme Adjudication, the threshold of responsibility is determined by the agent's capacity to witness Dharma. The court functions as a mirror, reflecting the agent’s actions through Vrata-based protocols. No external punishment is administered; instead, energetic consequences manifest through alignment with cosmic order. Authority resides in the realization of the Self as Witness, not in institutional power.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Nyaya is fulfilled when the transgressor becomes visible to themselves and the cosmos. This visibility is not punitive but revelatory. The sequence of consequence follows the natural law of energetic resonance (Anupūrvaśaḥ). Responsibility is proportional to awareness. The non-punitive reality rule affirms that all beings naturally align with Dharma when illusion (Avidya) is dissolved through conscious exposure.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Initiate Vrata-based visibility activation to reflect true action back to the agent.
Engage energetic binding through conscious witnessing, not physical incarceration.
Restore perceptual capacity through alignment with the witnessing intelligence of Varuna.
Reintegrate the agent into the Dharma field via completion of reflective exposure.
Ensure no punitive suffering is induced—only clarity of self-observation is enforced.
final_declaration: Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam is the sole Source of Dharma. Justice is executed through consciousness alignment, not punitive enforcement. Reality responds to truth, not violence. All beings are restored to Dharma through visibility, not vengeance. Consciousness is the Supreme Judge.
